newsitem.title: SPAIN: Spain crash kills eight Japanese, one Spaniard.
newsitem.headline: Spain crash kills eight Japanese, one Spaniard.

text.p: A minibus filled with Japanese tourists was in collision with a van on Tuesday near the Spanish cathedral town of Toledo, killing nine people and injuring three, state radio said.

The two vehicles burst into flames shortly after the crash, trapping some of the passengers inside. Eight of the dead were Japanese tourists on summer vacation and the ninth victim, believed to be a Spaniard, had been travelling in the van.
Local media said some of the occupants of the minibus were burned to death in their seats.
Helicopters and ambulances rushed the injured to hospitals in Madrid. The crash occurred on a busy motorway which runs between Madrid and Toledo, a popular tourist destination near the capital.
